articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.title: Activision Explains Why Call of Duty Warzone Mobile Has 120-Player Verdansk and PC and Console Do Not - IGN
articles.description: IGN interviews Activision about Call of Duty Warzone Mobile, which launches with 120-player Verdansk.
articles.content: It seems odd that Activision would release Call of Duty Warzone Mobile when it already has a hugely successful Call of Duty mobile game making millions of dollars for the company. But from a business… [+14808 chars]
